phrs.translation: 巨石文化, 巨石, 远古时代的巨石碑, 邪恶摩艾
的翻译是一个高大直立问题由来已久, 主要是从法国北部和英格兰地区发现的

sentences.sentence: There is no way we can know exactly why the megalith builders set the big stones into the ground.
sentences.translation: 我们无法确知为什么古建筑者把巨石嵌入地面。

sentences.sentence: The reporter walks into park of relics of earthquake of Qing Chuandong bayou, engraving on megalith together " 2008;"
sentences.translation: 记者走进青川东河口地震遗址公园，一块巨石上镌刻着“2008；

sentences.sentence: Many English words coming from the same root, such as magic, magnificent, majesty, master, megalith, and even magnetics, still retain some of this original sense.
sentences.translation: 很多英语单词都来自同样的根源，比如魔法师(魔术师)，华丽，最高权威，主人，巨石，甚至是磁力学，仍然保留著这个最初的意义。
